Document

Typescript of Letter from Voronsky to the OGPU, 7 September 1929
Description: Typescript of the letter from Voronsky to the Special Board of the OGPU, 7 September 1929, requesting permission to travel from exile in Lipetsk to Moscow for medical treatment. A copy was sent to the Central Control Commission.
Translation:

I request permission to travel to Moscow, since I need to consult with Moscow physicians, and perhaps to receive clinical treatment under their supervision. I became ill in March of this year. Local medical treatment did not help me. Moreover, the conclusions of the physicians here about the character of my illness differ. -- A. Voronsky. 7/IX/29. Pervomaiskaia, 60, Lipetsk.
